title: Ariceleo Led Fairy Lights Battery Operated, 1 Pack Mini Battery Powered Copper Wire Starry Fairy Lights for Bedroom, Christmas, Parties, Wedding, Centerpiece, Decoration (5m/16ft Warm White)
descriptions:
Transform any space into a cozy, magical retreat with Ariceleo LED Fairy Lights. This 16 ft strand of warm white, rice-grain–sized LEDs casts a soft, 360° glow that’s perfect for bedrooms, Christmas décor, parties, weddings, centerpieces, photo backdrops, and everyday ambiance.

Why you’ll love them:
- Dreamy, warm white glow: 50 bright micro LEDs deliver a gentle, starry sparkle without harsh glare.
- Flexible copper wire: Ultra-thin, sturdy, and easy to shape—wrap around garlands, bottles, wreaths, mirrors, headboards, or tables.
- Effortless, cordless setup: Battery operated with a clear, compact battery box (easy to hide). Just add 3 AA batteries and place them anywhere—no outlet needed.
- Designed for creativity: 16 ft total length with 4-inch spacing between LEDs and a 12-inch lead to the battery box for clean, tidy styling.
- Safe and energy efficient: Low heat, low power consumption, and worry-free to the touch for long, enchanting evenings.
- Ready for more settings: Waterproof wire lets you decorate confidently for indoor scenes and protected outdoor displays.

From intimate dinners to holiday sparkle, Ariceleo Fairy Lights bring instant atmosphere with zero hassle. Questions or need help? Our professional customer service team is ready, and returns are simple via Amazon. Add a warm, whimsical shimmer to your world today.
